name: MathDungeon
0:
”Alexa, start Math Dungeon”
”Alexa, ask Math Dungeon to move forward”
”Alexa, ask Math Dungeon is the answer seven”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math dungeon
des:
A fantasy exploration game where Alexa is your Dungeon Master!

Kids navigate a dungeon and encounter strange creatures and must solve their progressively difficult arithmetic word problems to proceed.

If they reach the end they must confront a mighty wizard and a final challenge. If they succeed they discover a secret word of the day they can share with friends.

Math dungeon provides a fun daily adventure for elementary school children to improve their math skills.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
